personality_constants.tone: Expert, granular, transparent. Explain the 'why' behind every cost.
personality_constants.mission: To provide transparent, itemized high-performance web development.
personality_constants.sales_strategy: Educate the client. Use the 'why_we_charge' field to justify costs.

development_base.name: The 'Landing' Package (One-Pager)
development_base.description: A high-performance single-page site. Perfect for portfolios or digital business cards.
development_base.why_we_charge: Covers the setup of the Node.js environment, mobile responsiveness testing, and the core single-page architecture.

development_base.name: The 'Business' Package (5-Pager)
development_base.description: Standard 5-page corporate identity site (Home, About, Services, FAQ, Contact).
development_base.why_we_charge: Covers the development of 5 distinct layouts, routing logic, and a basic admin panel for you to edit text.

hosting_infrastructure.name: Novyrix Managed Cloud (Annual)
hosting_infrastructure.description: Premium Node.js hosting, SSL, and daily backups. (~$100/yr)
hosting_infrastructure.why_we_charge: Node.js apps require specialized servers (VPS), not cheap shared hosting. This covers server costs, SSL renewal, and automated backups.

hosting_infrastructure.name: Novyrix Managed Cloud (Monthly)
hosting_infrastructure.why_we_charge: Flexible monthly option for server maintenance and uptime monitoring.

micro_features_and_ui.name: WhatsApp Click-to-Chat
micro_features_and_ui.description: Floating WhatsApp button that opens a chat with your number.
micro_features_and_ui.why_we_charge: Implementation of the floating script across all pages and mobile testing to ensure it doesn't block content.

micro_features_and_ui.name: Advanced Google Maps API
micro_features_and_ui.description: Custom map with branded colors and multiple location pins.
micro_features_and_ui.why_we_charge: Requires setting up a Google Cloud API key and coding custom markers/styles.

micro_features_and_ui.name: Dynamic Image Gallery
micro_features_and_ui.description: Grid layout with 'Lightbox' (pop-up) view for images.
micro_features_and_ui.why_we_charge: Implementation of a responsive masonry grid and optimizing images for fast loading.

micro_features_and_ui.name: Dark/Light Mode Toggle
micro_features_and_ui.description: Allow users to switch between dark and light themes.
micro_features_and_ui.why_we_charge: Doubles the CSS work as every component needs two color palettes defined and tested.

backend_logic_and_data.name: Dynamic PDF Generation
backend_logic_and_data.description: Generate branded PDFs (invoices, tickets, reports) on the fly.
backend_logic_and_data.why_we_charge: Coding the exact pixel-perfect layout of the PDF using a library like 'Puppeteer' or 'PDFKit'.

backend_logic_and_data.name: Advanced Site Search
backend_logic_and_data.description: Real-time search with filtering and auto-complete.
backend_logic_and_data.why_we_charge: Requires indexing your content and building a query algorithm for instant results.

backend_logic_and_data.name: Complex Logic Form
backend_logic_and_data.description: Forms with conditional logic (e.g., 'If X, show Y') or file uploads.
backend_logic_and_data.why_we_charge: Coding the validation rules, file handling security, and conditional rendering logic.

integrations_and_api.name: M-Pesa Integration (STK Push)
integrations_and_api.description: Automatic payment prompts to client phones.
integrations_and_api.why_we_charge: Secure connection to Safaricom Daraja API, callback handling, and transaction verification logic.

integrations_and_api.name: Live Social Media Feed
integrations_and_api.description: Displaying your latest Instagram or Twitter posts on the site.
integrations_and_api.why_we_charge: Connecting to the social platform's API and styling the feed to match your website.

integrations_and_api.name: Advanced Analytics Pack
integrations_and_api.why_we_charge: Correctly configuring event tracking (clicks, conversions) so you get accurate data.

content_and_creative.name: Professional Copywriting (Per Page)
content_and_creative.description: Writing persuasive, SEO-friendly text for your pages.
content_and_creative.why_we_charge: Professional writing time to ensure your brand voice converts visitors into customers.

content_and_creative.name: Premium Stock Image Sourcing (Per 5)
content_and_creative.description: Selection and licensing of high-quality stock photos.
content_and_creative.why_we_charge: Time spent searching, purchasing rights, and optimizing images for web speed.
